title: Aaron Robinson & Tony Quiroga (Car & Driver)
description: This week our good friends from Car and Driver Aaron Robinson and Tony Quiroga stop by to regale us with tales of unfettered access and actual production budgets.  The topics are many and varied this week; we cover Aaron's time in Belfast along with his new F-Type farm, Tony arrives with his recently acquired 993 Porsche, Matt buys an IRS for his Fox Body project, and of course we cover all the interesting stuff coming out of Geneva Motor Show this year.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
